pages.text: $(#630000)Finding newly sprouted Beckons by sound alone can get annoying at times, if they even sound their arrival at all.

$(#630000)So I decided to solve this issue with a new tool: The Blighted Mirror. Any Nexus parasites, excluding Vagrants and Factories, will reveal their location to the holder in a similar manner to the Glowing effect. Simply holding the mirror is enough.
$(#630000)Creating it is simple: Trade a Strange Bone with a Tier 3 Factory.
